DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates in Chinese post-menopausal women the combination of drospirenone 2 mg and estradiol 1 mg for the treatment of climacteric symptoms, such as hot flushes (vasomotor symptoms) and uro-genital complaints.
DOC.brief_title: Safety/Efficacy Study of Drospirenone/Estradiol to Treat Postmenopausal Chinese Women With Vasomotor Symptoms.
DOC.detailed_description: The study has previously been posted by Schering AG, Germany. Schering AG, Germany has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare AG, Germany. Bayer HealthCare AG, Germany is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: Chinese postmenopausal women with moderate to severe vasomotor symptoms History of steroid hormone dependent malignant disease Known or suspected malignant or premalignant disease Current or history of severe heart, liver, renal, psychiatric disease Hyperlipemia
